intelligence_grade_justification: Excellent data availability — public company with extensive coverage. Pricing model fully transparent. Commission structure documented. Funding/valuation confirmed. Review data abundant (20K+ Trustpilot reviews). Georgian market specifics available.

company_profile.business_model: Two-sided marketplace connecting tutors with students. Subscription + per-lesson model. AI-powered study assistance alongside human tutoring.

other_investors: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

platform_model.how_it_works: Students browse tutor profiles, book trial lesson, then purchase lesson packages. Tutors set own prices. Preply handles payment processing, scheduling, and AI study tools.

commission_structure.note: Highest commission in industry. iTalki/Verbling/Lingoda charge 15-20%. But Preply invests heavily in student acquisition.
commission_structure.time_to_lowest_tier: ~5 months at 20 hrs/week to reach 400+ hours
commission_structure.effective_rate_example: New tutor at $25/hr rate actually earns ~$15.08/hr after trial lessons and commission

platform_model.lesson_packages: Students can buy packages with 5-10% discount (discount comes from tutor's earnings, not Preply's commission)
platform_model.cancellation_policy: <4 hours notice = tutor gets 100% payment. Within policy window = tutor gets nothing.
platform_model.scheduling: 24/7 — students book based on tutor availability across timezones

ielts_prep.note: Specialized IELTS tutors available — wide quality range

budget_tier.what_you_get: Non-native speakers, often from Eastern Europe/Asia. Basic conversation practice. Limited test prep expertise. May lack formal teaching credentials.
budget_tier.typical_tutor: University student or part-time teacher from a low-cost country

mid_tier.what_you_get: Experienced non-native speakers or newer native speakers. Can handle structured courses. Some TEFL/TESOL certified.

premium_tier.what_you_get: Experienced native speakers, CELTA/DELTA certified. Specialized in test prep or business English. Professional teachers.
premium_tier.typical_tutor: Professional teacher with 5+ years, CELTA, specific exam prep experience

ultra_premium.what_you_get: Top-rated tutors with extensive reviews. University professors, published authors, exam coaches.
ultra_premium.note: Very few at this range — most cluster $15-30

vs_ih_tbilisi.assessment: Preply is CHEAPER than IH for individual lessons ($14 avg vs $17-18). But IH group classes ($7-9/hr) beat Preply because they're group-subsidized. For students choosing between Preply 1-on-1 and IH group, the tradeoff is: individual attention (Preply) vs in-person community and certification (IH).

vs_bekas_school.assessment: Beka's group classes with native speakers are 2x cheaper than average Preply individual lessons. But Preply offers scheduling flexibility and 1-on-1.

social_media_intelligence.global_presence: Massive — multi-million dollar marketing budget as a unicorn startup

app_store.ios: Available, requires iOS 15.1+, also on macOS and visionOS
app_store.note: App described as 'so organized', 'very user friendly', 'nothing compares to Preply'

trustpilot.note: Rating varies by source — between 3.9 and 4.1. High volume of reviews provides statistical significance.

social_media_intelligence.georgia_specific_marketing: Not found — Preply targets globally, not Georgia-specific

positive_themes: Professional tutors tailored to individual needs
Extremely useful app to learn any language
Great variety and choice of teachers
negative_themes: 100% commission on trial lessons frustrates tutors
Tutor quality is inconsistent — no quality floor
Commission rate is highest in industry

student_testimonials: He's one of the best, and honestly, I can recommend him to everyone
An excellent language teacher. She is patient and kind and explains vocabulary and grammar very well
Very easy to use as a learner, very well integrated, no billing mistakes

target_segments: Professionals with irregular schedules needing flexibility
Students in smaller cities without local schools
Anyone wanting to try before committing (trial lessons)
value_propositions: From $3/lesson — lowest price point in market
AI-powered study tools alongside human tutoring
Trial lesson to test tutor fit
positioning.differentiation: Price, flexibility, and scale. No physical presence. No certification value.

strengths: $1.2B unicorn — massive resources for technology and marketing
Lowest price floor in market ($3/hr) — captures entire budget segment
AI tools complement human teaching — tech advantage over traditional schools
Trial lesson model — low commitment entry point
Mobile app — meets students where they are
Global scale means constant product improvement
weaknesses: No quality floor — anyone can be a tutor. Student must vet quality themselves.
No certification value — no Cambridge, IELTS, or recognized certificates
No physical presence — can't serve students who prefer in-person
100% trial commission destroys tutor goodwill — affects quality of tutors who stay
33% commission for new tutors means advertised rates don't reflect tutor earnings — creates pressure to raise prices
Trustpilot rating (3.9) is lower than expected for a market leader
No Georgia-specific marketing — Georgian students must navigate global platform
strategic_vulnerabilities: Quality perception gap — schools like IH/BC/Beka's signal quality through credentials; Preply cannot
No exam administration capability — students still need physical test centres
Tutor retention risk — high commission drives best tutors to competing platforms or private practice
AI disruption could commoditize basic tutoring — Preply's own AI tools may cannibalize human tutor demand
Local schools offering online could capture students who want 'best of both worlds'

marketing_tactics.trial_offer: Trial lesson with every new tutor (tutor receives $0 — Preply's acquisition cost)
marketing_tactics.referral_program: Exists globally — details not captured for Georgia
marketing_tactics.content_marketing: Extensive blog, SEO optimized for '[language] tutors [city]' queries
